trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"> </xref> de e para outros tipos de objeto.

trans-unit.source: The ModifierKeysConverter converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter.
trans-unit.target: O ModifierKeysConverter converte de e para um <xref:System.String>utilizando o caráter "+" como o delimitador.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+ALT` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> object consisting of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> keys.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a cadeia de `Control+ALT` teria de ser convertida para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>objeto consistindo no <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>chaves.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>

trans-unit.source: This behavior differs from the default XAML parser-level enumeration combine character of ",".
trans-unit.target: Este comportamento difere de acordo com o XAML ao nível do parser enumeração combinação de carateres predefinido de ",".
